extendedToolsNYAKDescription.message: This is an extension that adds new features to the Yandex Map Editor. These features are mainly intended for experienced users.

notOfficialYandexExtension.message: This is not an official Yandex extension

feedbackAndSupport.message: If you have a request or question, you can ask to the developer via Yandex.Messenger. If you yourself know how to fix the error - please, создайте Issue in the extension repository or do Pull request.

moduleSelectionDescription.message: You can choose which functions and modules you need, disabled modules will not run while working with Yandex Map Editor

addressValidationDescription.message: Adds the option to check the address points added to Yandex.Maps

favoriteObjectsDescription.message: Includes in the left menu a block with the favorite categories of objects, which are available for quick creation.

duplicateAddressSearchDescription.message: Looks for copies of address points, and if found, displays a warning in the address card.

roadIntersectionConflictCheckDescription.message: If only 2 roads converge at the intersection of road sections, then an attribute identity check will be performed

profileLinkFromYandexQ.message: Switching to a profile from Yandex.Q

profileLinkFromYandexQDescription.message: Adds the option to Yandex.Q Go to the user's profile on the Yandex Map Editor

satelliteImageColorCorrectionDescription.message: Adds the option to customize the layout for different parameters

streamAddressCreationDescription.message: Adds the option to autofill the address point card using the buttons (-2/-1/+1/+2)

navigateToOtherMapServicesDescription.message: Adds the option to switch to another map service

loadAdditionalInformationDescription.message: You can choose what information you want to display

loadUserSpecialRights.message: Loads information about special user permissions

renovationFundDataDescription.message: This setting is set in the subsection "Renovation Fund — mos.ru" in the left menu

houseNotInRenovationProgram.message: This house is not in the renovation program.

housesFromStreetInProgram.message: Houses from this street in the program

failedToGetRenovationInfo.message: Failed to get information from the Renovation Fund

nothingFoundForQuery.message: The request did not find anything

noErrorsInAddresses.message: There are no errors in the address points

noAddressErrorsFound.message: Errors in the address points were not found

houseNumbersCommaSeparated.message: House numbers must be separated by commas

houseNumbersNoRoadName.message: House numbers must not contain the name of the road

banMessageIgnoringComments.message:
Good afternoon, $1!

Unfortunately, you ignore the moderator's comments and continue to make mistakes when edit the map. Please reply to me at [Yandex.Messenger](https://yandex.com/chat#/) and I will remove the blockage early.

banDurationUpTo3Days.message: Choose any blocking period, but not more than 3 days

banMessageUnableToContact.message:
Good afternoon, $1!

Unfortunately, I have not been able to contact you through [Yandex.Messenger](https://yandex.com/chat#/). Please remove the restriction and email me, and then I will remove the lock early.

recommendedBanDuration1Day.message: The recommended lockout period for this reason is a day

banMessageSystematicViolations.message:
Good afternoon, $1!

Unfortunately, you make many mistakes when edit objects, despite them being explained to you.

Please study [rules](https://yandex.com/support/mapeditor/) for the blocking time, so as not to make mistakes in the future.

provideLinksToEditsWithErrors.message: It is desirable to provide links to several edits with errors

reasonForProvidingLinks.message:
This is necessary so that the user can better understand what mistakes he has made repeatedly.

References can be specified after the phrase «... in spite of their explanation to you». On the next line you can write «Here are a few examples of them:» and on a new line provide links to edits with a description of the mistake.

For the reason for blocking to have a uniform writing style, it is recommended to use a construction of the form:
— [Short description of the error](link to edit)

banMessageProfanity.message:
Good afternoon, $1!

In Yandex Map Editor prohibits the use of profanity in comments or profile. Please reconsider your attitude to cartography and study [rules] during the blocking period(https://yandex.com/support/mapeditor/)

banMessageHateSpeech.message:
Good afternoon, $1!

In Yandex Map Editor prohibits the use of statements directed at inciting hatred or enmity, or at disparagement of a person or group of persons.

Please reconsider your attitude to cartography and study [rules] during the blocking period(https://yandex.com/support/mapeditor/)

banMessageVandalism.message:
Good afternoon, $1!

Unfortunately, your edits are considered vandalism, so your profile is permanently blocked.

recommendedBanDurationPermanent.message: The recommended blocking period for this reason is forever

banMessageDuplicateProfile.message:
Good afternoon, $1!

Unfortunately, your profile is recognized as a copy of another one, of a blocked profile.

provideLinkToOtherProfile.message: It is desirable to provide a link to another profile of this user

reasonForProvidingProfileLink.message:
This is to make it easier to find a copy of the profile if a dispute arises.

The link can be specified instead of the inscription «of a blocked profile».

To make the reason for blocking have a uniform writing style, it is recommended to use a construction like: [blocked profile](link to profile)

appealBanMessage.message: You can always appeal a blocking through [support service](https://yandex.com/support/mapeditor/troubleshooting/fb_nmaps.html)

criticalErrorOccurred.message: There was a critical error in the operation of the extension

failedToConnectRenovationFund.message: Failed to connect to the Renovation Fund data server

goToGithubForUpdate.message: Do you want to go to GitHub to download the new version?

houseInRenovationProgram.message: House included in the Renovation Program

resettlementCompleted.message: Resettlement of the house is completed

resettlementCompletedHouseDemolished.message:
Resettlement of the house is completed.
 House demolished

resettlementAtInfoCenter.message: Resettlement of the house is carried out at the Information Center at:

infoCenterClosedContactPrefecture.message: The information center for the resettlement of the house is closed. On the issue of completion of resettlement, you can contact the prefecture of the administrative district.

resettlementNotStartedInfoCenterAddressL.message: Resettlement of the house has not yet begun. The address of the Information Center will be published on the day the resettlement starts.

manifestDescription.message: The expansion adds new special features to the Yandex Map Editor
